archimate:DataObject.name: Thing Controller Credential
archimate:DataObject.documentation: A Credential issued to a Thing Controller by an Identity Owner who has the legal authority to assign control of a Thing. A Thing Controller Credential may also be issued to a Thing if the Thing has its own Private Keys. See Appendix C.
